report.title: EBMS Occurrence Download Report
report.description: Lists saved occurrences. Normally invoked from download tab on annual summary page.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN surveys su ON su.id = parent.survey_id JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON s.location_id=l2.id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_list_id AS character varying)='#taxon_list_id#' OR '#taxon_list_id#' = '') #joins# WHERE parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# #filters# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#
report.field_sql: su.title AS survey, parent.id as sample_id, o.id as occurrence_id, ctt.term as site_type, l.code as site_code, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, l2.code as section_number, coalesce(l.code,l.name)||'.'||substring(l2.code from 2) as section_code, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, cttl.preferred_taxon as preferred

order_bys.order_by: l.code, parent.date_start, section_number, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, o.id DESC
